alert.note: Alert for Cheshire (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:57PM EDT until July 21 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cheshire County in southern New Hampshire... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Alstead to near Hinsdale, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Keene, Jaffrey, Peterborough, Winchester, Antrim, Dublin, Richmond, Harrisville, Nelson, Gilsum, Marlborough, Rindge, Walpole, Alstead, Westmoreland, Swanzey, Marlow, Hinsdale, Roxbury and Fitzwilliam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
